Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory534.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiRainNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "The tide of enemies has receded, leaving the once-peaceful fishing village in ruins. Among the wreckage lie the faint silhouettes of villagers' bodies."}
{3: 'The rain shows no sign of stopping, its bone-chilling drops carrying an unsettling malice.'}
{3: 'The guards gather the crowd together while a priestess chants soothing prayers.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Guard', 3: "Your Holiness, we've swept the surrounding beaches clean. No other survivors were found.", 4: '101', 18: '100003794', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Priestess', 3: 'Where is Lamia? Has anyone seen her?', 4: '101', 18: '100003795', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Priestess', 3: "Thank god you're safe. Good thing the guards acted just in time. Things would have surely been a lot worse had you been harmed.", 4: '101', 18: '100003797', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{2: 'Priestess', 3: "Let's be ready to leave. We must return to prepare for the next ritual—this disaster must be contained quickly. And...", 4: '101', 18: '100003798', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{3: 'The priestess pauses, tilting her head as if checking for something.'}
{3: 'The crowd parts to either side as she points in a certain direction, revealing someone standing in their midst.'}
{2: 'Priestess', 3: 'Begonia, consider yourself lucky for being the Chosen One. Would you join us for the sacred ritual?', 4: '101', 18: '100003801', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{2: 'Begonia', 3: 'So you want me to take part in the ritual... like how you asked Lamia to take part in the past rituals?', 4: '102', 18: '100003802', 19: '2', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{2: 'Priestess', 3: 'No... you are far luckier than Lamia. You shall stand beside Him—which is the highest honor one can ever imagine.', 4: '101', 18: '100003803', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{2: 'Begonia', 3: "I-I don't quite understand. You mean the Sea God will stop being angry if I participate in the ritual?", 4: '102', 18: '100003804', 19: '2', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{2: 'Priestess', 3: 'Yes, the people of this city will remember your contribution.', 4: '101', 18: '100003805', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{3: 'Begonia nods with childlike innocence and steps forward.'}
{3: 'You stand between Begonia and the priestess. Seeing this, the guards immediately raise their weapons.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Guard', 3: 'Who are you? How dare you show such disrespect toward Her Holiness?!', 4: '101', 18: '100003807', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{2: "You're planning to use Begonia as a sacrifice?", 3: '41'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Priestess', 3: '...We are merely offering her the privilege to serve God.', 4: '101', 18: '100003808', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{2: 'Are you serious?', 3: '45'}
{3: 'You gently pull Begonia back protectively.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Guard', 3: 'How dare you show such disrespect toward Her Holiness?!', 4: '101', 18: '100003809', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{3: 'Lamia stops the guard right when he steps forward ready to teach you a lesson.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "No! 【kuroname】 is my friend, not someone from here! Please, don't hurt 【kuroname】!", 4: '101', 18: '100003810', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Priestess', 3: "Ah, an outsider. No wonder... You've seen what happened in the village today. We'll only be seeing more tragedies like that if we don't hold a ritual.", 4: '101', 18: '100003811', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{2: 'So you turn your blades on the helpless—', 3: '59'}
{2: '—instead of facing the true source of this disaster?', 3: '60'}

{2: 'Priestess', 3: "I'll forgive your insolence for Lamia's sake. You know nothing of this city's history, nor do you understand the terrible wrath of the Sea God.", 4: '101', 18: '100003812', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{2: 'No matter how terrifying your enemy is, sacrificing your own people for peace is never the answer.', 3: '62'}
{2: 'Lamia, did you know about this all along?', 3: '63'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lamia', 3: "Eh? I... I know that. It takes rituals to quell the Sea God's wrath. Didn't I tell you about this before?", 4: '101', 18: '100003813', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{2: "You knew all along that these rituals require human sacrifice, didn't you?", 3: '68'}
{3: "Lamia freezes for a moment. Your question seems to have torn down a facade that's always been there, revealing the ugly truth beneath."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryLianyi.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3002_03.jpg', 3: '0.5', 4: '0.5', 5: '0'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Huff... Please... spare me... no... please... I beg you... let me g—AAGH!', 18: '100003680'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryLianyi.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: '??', 3: 'Mmh... so this... this is how I can be with Him? How wonderful...', 18: '100003681'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryLianyi.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory534.jpg'}
{3: 'Lamia speaks with uncertainty, her words hovering between an answer and a question to herself.'}
{2: 'So you knew all along...', 3: '94'}
{2: 'But you chose to sit around and let people die before your eyes, one after another.', 3: '95'}
{2: 'All for a moment of false peace?', 3: '96'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'The question strikes Lamia like the thunder from earlier, jolting her back to her senses.'}
{3: "To Lamia, everything that's happened probably didn't happen for the first time—except she doesn't remember any of them."}
{3: 'The priestess moves past Lamia and positions herself between you and her.'}

{2: 'Priestess', 3: "We don't have a choice. There's bound to be more victims if we don't perform a ritual now, and I don't believe you have what it takes to face that.", 4: '101', 18: '100003818', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The guards advance menacingly as the priestess speaks—all while you remain perfectly composed, showing not a hint of fear or hesitation.'}
{3: 'Perfectly calm, you raise your hand.'}
{2: 'I will be your sacrifice, then.', 3: '113'}
{3: "With it, you turn and gently pat Begonia's head, your face showing not a trace of impulse or anger."}
{3: 'They can tell without a doubt that this is all carefully calculated... and yet...'}
{2: 'Consider it repayment for saving my life, if you will.', 3: '121'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "If you will... Wait, what's that supposed to mean?", 4: '101', 18: '100003822', 19: '1', 21: 'v211lamiya'}
{2: "It's also because someone has asked me to look for a child who shares your name.", 3: '123'}
{3: 'With those words, you walk toward the guards with unwavering resolve.'}
{2: "I'll go with you."}
